ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] More than 6 in a group?
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t particularly want to sneak an extra person into the group, but its very annoying having 7 people show up for a guild event.  It would have been nice
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't particularly want to sneak an extra person into the group, but its
very annoying having 7 people show up for a guild event. It would have been
nice to include them. No doubt this is now at the top of Verant's list of
fixes and fixing actual things in the game that damage its enjoyability by
the customers will be pushed back yet again. All in the name of integrity.


How can a game where a necro's pet can outdamage each and every one of the
other 5 people in a fight when the necro is lowest level character present,
have any integrity to begin with. Bah!

Kit

I didn't catch the message last night. I never thought of it as an exploit.
Now I do.

It'd be a shame to lose everything I've worked for over the past seven
months just to sneak an extra person into the group.

Definitely not worth it.
